title: Live Stream: Peter Hurley's Studio Party at PhotoPlus Expo
summary: Photographer Peter Hurley live streams a crowded industry party at his New York City studio. The video includes a tour of the event, interactions with various guests and photographers, a look at a custom-built grass photo booth, a trip to the rooftop for skyline views, and a stand-up comedy performance.

steps.action: Audio and video check inside a closet before entering the party.
Entering the main studio space and greeting party guests.
Showcasing the custom photo booth setup featuring a green grass background.
Explanation of the lighting setup for the photo booth, noting the use of heavy lights hung by rope.
Climbing the ladder to the rooftop to show the view of the Empire State Building and the crowd outside.
Dave Bradford performs a stand-up comedy set for the attendees.

key_takeaways: Networking and socializing are key components of industry events like PhotoPlus Expo.
Creative photo booth setups, such as a grass wall with high-end lighting, engage guests.
Utilizing unique venue features like a rooftop with a view adds value to an event.
